title: Add support for ```Variable``` symbol
body:
This PR aims to resolve issue #694 
With this PR I am able to successfully generate ASR for ```scipy/linalg/src/id_dist/src/idzr_rid.f``` , for ```scipy/linalg/src/id_dist/src/idd_id.f```

labels.name: SciPy
labels.description: issues related to enable LFortran to compile the entire FORTRAN codebase in SciPy
